title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 475.4 - Judicial review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 475.4 - Judicial review

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 502
A carrier whose permit has been denied, suspended or
revoked may institute a proceeding in the Supreme Court of the State of New

York under article 78 of the Civil Practice Law and Rules to review such
denial, suspension or revocation. This remedy is the exclusive remedy available
to the carrier to secure a judicial review of the denial, suspension or
revocation of a permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
475.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
